Type Property# verification

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+macOS 14.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 10.0+

```

```

Available when `Self` is `StoreKitVerificationAPI`.## [See Also](/documentation/storekittest/failablestorekitapi/verification#see-also)
